post:
**[ExpertVM](http://expertvm.com/)** is a provider of cheap VPS in Singapore. As a subsidiary of **[SecureAX Internet](http://secureax.com/)**, **[ExpertVM](http://expertvm.com/)** enjoys the robust and reliable network infrastructure and technical capability that **[SecureAX Internet](http://secureax.com/)** built on since 2007.

Our top selling cheap OpenVZ and KVM VPS packages are as follow:

**KVM1 - USD$40/year**
- 128MB RAM
- 10GB Disk Space
- 40GB/month bandwidth @ 10mbps
- 1 x IPv4
- KVM Virtualisation
**[ORDER NOW](http://expertvm.com/pre-signup.php?id=8)**

**KVM2 - USD$6.99/month**
- 256MB RAM
- 20GB Disk Space
- 80GB/month bandwidth @ 10mbps
- 1 x IPv4
- KVM Virtualisation
**[ORDER NOW](http://expertvm.com/pre-signup.php?id=9)**

**ovz1 - USD$40/year**
- 128MB RAM
- 10GB Disk Space
- 40GB/month bandwidth @ 10mbps
- 1 x IPv4
- OpenVZ Virtualisation
**[ORDER NOW](http://expertvm.com/pre-signup.php?id=1)**

**ovz2 - USD$6.99/month**
- 256MB RAM
- 20GB Disk Space
- 80GB/month bandwidth @ 10mbps
- 1 x IPv4
- OpenVZ Virtualisation
**[ORDER NOW](http://expertvm.com/pre-signup.php?id=3)**

To find out more about us or our complete range of VPS packages, [ExpertVM](http://expertvm.com/)

Thank you for your attention!
